ta.title: දේශබන්දුගේ ඉල්ලීම අධිකරණය ප්‍රතික්ෂේප කරයි
body_lines: கோட்டை மாஜிஸ்திரேட் திருமதி நிலபுல் லங்காபுராவில் இந்த நாள் செலவு உரிமம் அழைக்கப்பட்டது.

en.title: Court denies Deshabandu's request
body_lines: Former Inspector General of IGP Deshaband Tennakoon has been rejected to prevent his arrest and released on an expenditure.
The Expense License was called at the Fort Magistrate Mrs. Nilapulle Lankapura this day.
